Class ProtegeData

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.design.widget.NavigationView.OnNavigationItemSelectedListener, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback

    public class ProtegeData
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements android.support.design.widget.NavigationView.OnNavigationItemSelectedListener
    Controller for ProtegeData activity, allowing user to update protege data on server

      • updateProtege

        public void updateProtege(View view)
        Method used to get data from view and call method to connect with server with this data This method is checking if data is set by using try catch. If user choose something it saves it in protege fields in appUser object Later it calls the UpdateFromMobile AsyncTask to communicate with server
